name: Whiteout (itch) (Team Joshtaters)
description:
Whiteout is an game where you experience a narrative told through finding objects from your past. You are plagued with insomnia and begin to question what is real.

This game was made for the UW-Whitewater October Game Jam.

The theme was "Goodnight, goodnight! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say goodnight till it be morrow."
